Extracted Data.Name: Meka Veeranna Chowdary
Extracted Data.Summary or Objective: Results driven Power BI Developer with 6 years of experience in designing and developing interactive dashboards, reports, and data models. Adept at transforming complex data into actionable insights to drive strategic decision making across diverse business domains. Proficient in Power BI, DAX, Power Query, and SQL, with a solid foundation in business intelligence, data analytics, and data visualization best practices.

Experience.Title: Business Intelligence Analyst
Experience.Description: Partnered with cross functional teams in healthcare and retail to identify data driven opportunities, streamline reporting processes, and enhance operational efficiency. Designed and implemented complex DAX measures and calculated columns to migrate and enhance legacy Excel reports into interactive and scalable Power BI dashboards. Developed performance oriented dashboards, including Physician and OKR Dashboards, by integrating key performance indicators (KPIs) and utilizing diverse visualizations to support strategic decision making. Applied deep knowledge of Power BI, DAX, Power Query, and SQL to deliver high impact insights, reduce manual effort, and drive data consistency across departments.

Experience.Title: Power BI Developer
Experience.Description: Designed and developed interactive Power BI dashboards to analyze key business KPIs, driving more informed and timely executive decision making. Led the BI development efforts for an e commerce analytics project as a Senior Power BI Developer, collaborating closely with business and analytics teams. Interpreted Business Requirement Documents (BRDs) to create and validate metadata in coordination with functional experts and the data team. Prepared and modeled datasets based on finalized metadata, implementing incremental refresh to optimize performance and maintain data accuracy. Developed dynamic reports in Power BI Desktop by connecting to live datasets, creating advanced visualizations, and applying row level security (RLS) to ensure data governance and user level access control.

Experience.Title: Data Aggregation Associate
Experience.Description: Contributed to data engineering tasks at Deepcompute, including data aggregation, representation, cleaning, and iterative module tuning to support data science initiatives and reporting requirements. Worked on the nference pharmaceutical project, developing applications to manage relationships between drugs, diseases, and biomedical devices, enabling pharma companies to identify potential drug solutions. Extracted and processed data from JSON, CSV, XML, HTML, and PDF formats, transforming it into structured datasets for analytics and visualization in tools such as Power BI.

Extracted Data.Education: Master of Computer Applications (MCA), Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Kakinada (2014 – 2017)

Recommendations: Add specific details and quantifiable achievements to the project section. For example, mention the **technologies** used and the **impact** of the projects, even if they were academic projects.

Include any relevant certifications to demonstrate expertise and commitment to professional development, especially in areas like **Power BI**, **Data Analysis**, or **Data Warehousing** to improve the **certifications** section.

Consider quantifying accomplishments within each role to showcase the impact of your contributions. For example, specify how your **dashboards** improved **decision-making** or increased **efficiency**.

Tailor the summary to match the specific requirements of the job. Highlighting your most relevant skills and experiences at the top can quickly grab the recruiter's attention. Focus on **Power BI** and **data analytics** roles.

While a comprehensive list of skills is beneficial, prioritize the most relevant and sought-after skills for the desired roles. Ensure your skills align with the **job description** and are reflected in your **experience** section.

Ensure there are no grammatical errors or typos, even minor ones, as they can significantly impact the perception of your attention to detail. Use **grammar checking tools** to improve **Spelling & Grammar** section.
Consider adding a section for awards or recognitions to highlight outstanding achievements and set yourself apart from other candidates. Especially for **Power BI** or **Data Analysis**.

Technical_easy.questions: What is Power BI and how is it used in data analysis?
Technical_easy.answer: Power BI is a business analytics service by Microsoft. It provides interactive visualizations and business intelligence capabilities with a simple interface for end users to create their own reports and dashboards. It is used to analyze data from a wide range of sources and create actionable insights.

Technical_easy.questions: Can you describe the difference between a calculated column and a measure in Power BI?
Technical_easy.answer: A calculated column is computed at the time the data is loaded and stored in the data model, whereas a measure is calculated at query time. Measures are dynamic and depend on the context of the report.

Technical_easy.questions: What is DAX and why is it important in Power BI?
Technical_easy.answer: DAX (Data Analysis Expressions) is a formula expression language used in Power BI to define calculations and data manipulation. It is essential for creating custom measures, calculated columns, and tables that allow for advanced data analysis.
